question: Who don't hear will feel.
choices: No one is immune to the consequences of their actions
Speak softly and carry a big stick
Actions speak louder than words
A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush

question: Every hoe have them stick a bush.
choices: There is a suitable partner for everyone
There is no smoke without fire
There is no such thing as a perfect person or thing
It takes all sorts to make a world

question: Wanti wanti, can't getti; getti getti, no wanti.
choices: The grass is always greener on the other side
Be content with what you have
You can't always get what you want
A penny saved is a penny earned

question: Chicken merry, hawk deh near.
choices: Don't count your chickens before they hatch
The early bird catches the worm
Beware of false friends
Misery loves company

question: Cow never know the use of him tail till him lose it.
choices: You don't appreciate what you have until it's gone
It's never too late to learn
Actions speak louder than words
A little knowledge is a dangerous thing

question: Don't tek people things fi joke.
choices: Honesty is the best policy
Treat others how you want to be treated
Respect other people's property
The pen is mightier than the sword

question: One, one, cocoa full basket,
choices: A little of something is better than a lot of nothing
Don't put all your eggs in one basket
You can't have your cake and eat it too
All that glitters is not gold

question: Every mikkle mek a mukkle.
choices: Many hands make light work
It's the little things that count
Patience is a virtue
Slow and steady wins the race

question: Mouth kibba heart catch.
choices: Think before you speak
Actions speak louder than words
A picture is worth a thousand words
The customer is always right

question: Jack Mandora, me no choose none.
choices: I have no preference
I'm not in the mood to choose
I'm not easily swayed
I'm a man of my word
